summary.span: 命名空間包含支援 .NET Framework 並存實作版本控制的進階型別。

span.span: The namespace contains advanced types that support versioning in side by side implementations of the .NET Framework.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個命名空間中找到的型別被適用於.NET Framework 中不適用於使用者應用程式。The types found in this namespace are intended for use within the .NET Framework and not for user applications.
